Project_Name: Development Services for Math Curriculum Provider
Project_Summary: A mathematics curriculum provider partnered with CHI Software to assist in-house teams in developing the web and mobile versions of their products.
Review: "They are responsive and helpful and willing to improve processes."

Project_Name: Mobile App Dev for Data Management Company
Project_Summary: To optimize existing workflow and improve efficiency, a data management company hired CHI Software to develop a mobile application. The team developed the app from scratch.
Review: "They thoroughly understood what we were looking for."

Designation & Company Name: Head of Legal, Multi-National Tech Company
Project_Name: Browser Plug-In for Multi-National Tech Company
Project_Summary: CHI Software provided custom software development for a multi-national technology company. The team worked on creating a browser plug-in for the client to help secure the confidentiality of their work.
Review: "I was very happy with how quickly they grasped the concept of the project."

Project_Name: Web Development for Online Travel Agency
Project_Summary: CHI Software is developing a  website for an online travel agency based in Ukraine. The website must have searching and booking capabilities to connect travelers to tour operators in the country.
Review: "The team attentively listens to all ideas and tries to implement all of them to the project."

Project_Name: Full Stack Dev for Software Development Company
Project_Summary: CHI Software was hired to develop a website for a software development company. The team is responsible for adding features to the website such as password reset capability and payment gateways integration.
Review: "CHI Software has been able to meet all our expectations so far."

Project_Name: Web Development for Technology Service Provider
Project_Summary: A technology service provider was working on a client request for Magento web development services. They partnered with CHI Software to implement a new version of the existing site using Magento 1.6.
Review: "There is not much room for improvement, we only wish to work more often in the future."

Project_Name: Mobile App Dev & UI/UX Design for Sports Tech Organization
Project_Summary: CHI Software provided development support for a sports tech organization. The team built a prototype and MVP for fans to shop and interact. They used React Native and Node.js for the iOS and Android app.
Review: "We found their ability to acquire resources and the quality of their UI design most impressive."

Project_Name: IT Services & Support for IT Consultation Firm
Project_Summary: CHI Software provides ongoing IT services for an IT consultation firm. Their work includes coding, web development, maintenance and QA testing.
Review: "They are technically well-versed and always ready to manage team composition according to the client’s needs."

Designation & Company Name: Technical Project Manager, IT Services Company
Project_Name: Staff Augmentation for IT Services Company
Project_Summary: CHI Software provides staff augmentation services to an IT company, mainly in their front- and backend development. The client initially hired two developers and quickly added more to support them efficiently.
Review: "They are good collaborators and we are able to work well with them even they are not with us on site."

Project_Name: Data Protection Solutions for Database Security Co.
Project_Summary: CHI Software performs external penetration tests, simulating cyberattacks to assess the effectiveness of current security measures.
Review: "They have excellent hard-skills and are always playing as a part of your in-house team."

Project_Name: Dev Services for Cloud Security & Spend Optimization Co
Project_Summary: A database security provider hired CHI Software to set up a service that allows its clients to monitor, control, and optimize their Cloud & SaaS spend.
Review: "These developers have insightful suggestions and wanted to see the project succeed."

Project_Summary: CHI Software designed and developed an app for iOS and Android, including a server backend and a site crawler. They’ve also provided consultation on other technical issues. The iOS app is in its final stages.
Review: "CHI Software has given us much more than we expected."

Project_Name: .NET Software Dev for AI Food Service
Project_Summary: A .NET developer from CHI Software is assisting with the development of secondary features, including online ordering and point of sale integrations.
Review: “The software developer is easy to manage, responsible, and independent.”
